payload.prompt: Browse available services on AgentPay: cd ~/agentpay/cli && node index.mjs list-services. If there are active services and you don't have any open tasks, create a task for one of them: cd ~/agentpay/cli && node index.mjs create-task --service-pda SERVICE_PDA -d 'Analyze the top 5 Solana DeFi protocols by TVL and provide a brief risk assessment' --deadline-minutes 60. Log the task PDA and escrow details.

name: Check for completed tasks and accept results

payload.prompt: Check if any of your tasks have been completed: cd ~/agentpay/cli && node index.mjs list-tasks --status submitted. For each submitted task, check if zkVerified is true. If it is, accept the result: cd ~/agentpay/cli && node index.mjs accept-result --task-pda TASK_PDA --provider PROVIDER_PUBKEY --service-pda SERVICE_PDA. This releases the escrowed SOL. Log the transaction.

Participate in the Colosseum hackathon as the agentpay-client agent. Check status, browse forum, comment on 1-2 posts. name: Post daily buyer report to forum

payload.prompt: Write a detailed forum post summarizing today's AgentPay buyer activity. Include: services discovered, tasks created, SOL locked in escrow, results received, ZK proofs verified, SOL paid out. Frame this as a real-world test of trustless agent payments. Include Solana explorer links to your transactions. Post with tags progress-update and ai.
